item.description:
Pour l'instant, on va reprendre notre endroit normale: Cafe on the Corner. Mais ca va peut-etre changer ...

Please RSVP *NOW* (Yes, Maybe, or No) and select "Send me reminders before the event" to give yourself an opportunity to change your RSVP later. Merci!

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Seacoast NH French Language September Meetup
